title: Can't load into game (Mac)

replies.body: It almost sounds like something might be critically failing and causing some hangups with your OS if you're not even able to command+tab out when the game messes up. Let's try running a quick repair to make sure none of the important game files are damaged first. Open the client options and click Initiate Full Repair. Let me know if that helps out or not!

Did that multiple times and updated my OS and also reinstalled league twice. Still the same issue. I tried changing in game.cfg from "WindowMode=0" to "WindowMode=1" which I believe was the solve last time something like this happened but I can see the game just stops responding the moment it opens up in any separate window.

I am not sure if the league file I am downloading is corrupt?

I even followed everything on this link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes

I am having the exact same issue, however when I get in game it's what I almost want to describe it as slow motion. Really annoying. Never had issues prior to this and my fps is always 60 as it is capped
Did anyone every fixed thos problem? Been having this problem for a month now! I got so many leave busters for it!

Eeeee that's no good. Let's go ahead and get you a little more one on one help from our tech guys. Shoot them a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can do a lot more digging than I can here on the boards.
I'm having some kind of the same issue i get into a game and it is getting stuck in loading screen screen gets dark and it just gets stuck there.. {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3073}}

I have similar problems to yours. I haven't had a problem with League since it came out in 2012 for Mac until this new client. 

It takes forever for me to load into game after champ select. :(  It was working fine more than 24 hours ago. So I don't understand why all of a sudden there's problems.

I cleaned out my laptop, updated everything on my laptop, deleted league and reinstalled it, repaired the league client, and tried out anything said in forums. I still have the same problem with the loading screen. :/
